title: Charmed
excerpt: A charmed creature can't attack the charmer, and the charmer has Advantage on social ability checks against the creature.
markdown: # Charmed While you have the Charmed condition, you experience the following effects: * **Can't Harm the Charmer.** You can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with damaging abilities or magical effects. * **Social Advantage.** The charmer has Advantage on any ability check to interact with you socially.
